views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11

ClassicPlayer - The Clickwheel Music Player

Relive the good old days where listening to music was simple with ClassicPlayer, a music players that emulates the classic music player experience on your iPhone or iPod Touch!

ClassicPlayer provides a simple, easy to use interface that makes listening to music a breeze! Simply open the app, slide your finger around, and listen to your favorite tunes!

Classic Player features:

- Light and Dark themes
- Familiar, classic interface
- Easy to navigate (unlike other music apps)
- Syncs with your iTunes library!
- More features to come! (games, maybe?)

=============
Legal Disclaimer:
=============

The iPod Classic™, The Clickwheel, and any other reference or resemblance to an Apple Inc. product or design are sole property of Apple Inc. or its content suppliers and/or vendors and protected by United States and International Copyright Laws.

ClassicPlayer only attempts to emulate the iPod Classic™ experience, and is in no way, shape, or form affiliated with Apple Inc.

- Update for iOS 11 / iPhone X
- Now free!
